Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Lemonade \Lem`on*ade"\ (l[e^]m`[u^]n*[=a]d"), n. [F. limonade; cf. Sp. limonada, It. limonata. See {Lemon}.] A beverage consisting of lemon juice mixed with water and sweetened. ``If you have lemons, make lemonade'' [1913 Webster]
lemonade n : sweetened beverage of diluted lemon juice
